entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
